question: Which ratings agency has slashed the GDP growth forecast of India to 0.8% from its previous estimate of 2%, for the financial year 2020-21?
explanation:
The Fitch Ratings Agency has recently slashed its growth forecast for India in the financial year 2020-21 to 0.8%, amid the estimated severe global recession.
Earlier, the ratings agency had estimated the forecast for India to be 2%, which was claimed to be the lowest forecast for thirty years. The agency estimated that the economy of China would grow at 0.7% in 2020-21.
